title: AgentProfile
description: A comprehensive agent profile for the Backend.AI Agent Marketplace. Defines an agent's identity, prompts, tool permissions, model preferences, and operational settings.

$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema reference for editor support.

id.description: Unique identifier (typically UUID v4 or a human-readable slug like 'catalog-python-expert').

description.description: Short description of what this profile does.

icon.description: Emoji or icon identifier for display.

systemPrompt.description: System prompt text that defines the agent's persona and behavior.

instructions.description: Standing instructions applied to every task.

translations.description: Per-locale translation overlays. Keys are IETF BCP 47 locale strings (e.g., 'ko', 'ja', 'zh-Hans'). Missing translations fall back to the base (English) fields.

tags.description: Searchable tags for categorization and discovery.

isBuiltin.description: Whether this is a built-in template (cannot be deleted or modified).

isCommunity.description: Whether this profile was sourced from the community marketplace.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when this profile was created.

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when this profile was last updated.

AgentCategory.description: Classification of an agent profile's primary purpose.

ToolConfig.description: Configuration for tool access and permissions within an agent profile.

enabledTools.description: Tool names that are explicitly enabled for this profile.

disabledTools.description: Tool names that are explicitly disabled for this profile.

toolPermissionOverrides.description: Per-tool permission level overrides. Values must be one of the ToolPermission variants.

customToolConfigs.description: Tool-specific configuration as arbitrary JSON (e.g., shell timeout, file size limits).

ModelPreferences.description: Model preferences for an agent profile.

preferredModelId.description: Preferred model identifier to use with this profile.

minContextWindow.description: Minimum context window size (in tokens) required by this profile.

requiresToolCalling.description: Whether this profile requires tool calling / function calling support.

requiresVision.description: Whether this profile requires vision / multimodal support.

AgentSettingsOverrides.description: Operational settings that a profile can override from global defaults. All fields are optional; null means 'use the global default'.

maxIterations.description: Maximum agent loop iterations before forced termination.

maxToolCalls.description: Maximum tool calls allowed per agent run.

defaultTimeout.description: Default timeout for tool execution in seconds.

contextCompressionThreshold.description: Token count threshold for triggering context compression.

allowedPaths.description: Filesystem paths the agent is permitted to access.

ProfileTranslation.description: Per-locale translation overlay for translatable agent profile fields. All fields are optional â€” missing translations fall back to the base (English) field.
